cause.description:
Jews today are made fun of and taunted because of stereotypical ideas about them. e.g. All Jews have big noses; what's the biggest dillema for Jewish people? free pork...
1. Thou shalt not kill Jews
2. Thou shalt not steal from Jews
3. Thou shalt love all Jews
cause.mission: try to get the world to stop hating on people just because they are Jewish
cause.name: Demolish Jew Haters
